text:
July lh, 1952
Sent copy for THE JEFFERSONIAN HERITAGE folders over to Mr. Eckerstiora
of the University Press. I made the following corrections indicated in
a wire from Siegel?
1. Eliminated the word "our" and substituted "the" in all
places mentioning the name of the series. Title should
read THE JEFFERSONIAN HERITAGE.
2. After names of Adult Education Committee, added:
"Project Director for all series is Wiliam Harley of
Radio Station WHA, Madison, Wisconsin."
Lorraine
